abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Auto-detect traps/mechanisms in searched objects. Perception checks to find them have advantage.

abilities.name: Iron Grip
abilities.description: Cannot be disarmed unless Stunned or Petrified.

abilities.name: Surefooted
abilities.description: Advantage on resisting forced movement or being knocked Prone.

abilities.name: Mechanical Companion 1
abilities.description: Create a mechanical companion.

abilities.name: Mechanical Companion 2
abilities.description: Improve your mechanical companion. This ability replaces Mechanical Companion 1.

abilities.name: Mechanical Companion 3
abilities.description: Further improve your mechanical companion. This ability replaces Mechanical Companion 2.

abilities.name: Mount Whisperer
abilities.description: You automatically succeed on checks to tame a mount, and once per combat when your mount falls to 0HP, it may instead remain at 1HP.

abilities.name: Frugal Crafter
abilities.description: On a failed crafting check, roll a d6; on 5â€“6, salvage all materials.

abilities.name: Jury-rigger
abilities.description: Once per day repair a broken item temporarily for 1 combat.

abilities.name: Ritual Fortitude
abilities.description: Start the day with barrier equal to level if full HP & no exhaustion.

abilities.name: Caster's Reflex
abilities.description: If you cast a spell during your last turn, when attacked you may take 1 exhaustion to dodge that attack, avoiding all damage.

abilities.name: Guardian's Stance
abilities.description: Once per round if an adjacent ally is targeted by a ranged or spell attack, you may take the hit instead.

abilities.name: Wilderness Footing
abilities.description: Reduce MVMT cost in rough terrain types by 1 (min 1).

abilities.name: Fleet of Foot
abilities.description: Roll travel MVMT with advantage.

abilities.name: Survivor's Instinct
abilities.description: Auto-succeed on basic survival tasks (water, shelter, fire).

abilities.name: Pathfinder's Sense
abilities.description: Advantage on navigation/orientation/hidden area checks.

abilities.name: Lock Whisperer
abilities.description: You open non-magical locks in half the usual time and roll to do so with advantage.

abilities.name: Scholar's Insight
abilities.description: Roll with advantage on one chosen Scholarly skill.

abilities.name: Linguistic Expert
abilities.description: Understand the basics of all languages even if you don't speak them.

abilities.name: Well-Read
abilities.description: Ask 1 lore question per session and receive a true answer.

abilities.name: Gambler's Luck
abilities.description: Once per day you may reroll a natural 1.

abilities.name: Elemental Attunement
abilities.description: Elemental spells (fire, frost, lightning, nature) deal extra damage equal to half your level.

abilities.name: Death Sense
abilities.description: You can always detect corpses, undead, and necromantic residue within 40ft without a roll.

abilities.name: Nature's Favor
abilities.description: When casting a Druidic healing or root-based spell, roll healing/duration with advantage if standing on natural ground.

abilities.name: Radiant Echo
abilities.description: When you cast a Holy spell that heals or shields, the target glows faintly. Their next contest is rolled with advantage.

abilities.name: Spell Precision
abilities.description: When you deal damage with an Arcane spell, you may reroll one die and use the new result.

abilities.name: Prepared Components
abilities.description: The first floral spell you cast in a combat acts as if you've expended one component.

abilities.name: Crimson Catalyst
abilities.description: You may take 1HP damage to increase the range of a Shadow spell by 1 tile.

abilities.name: Escape Artist
abilities.description: Once per day, you can escape from bonds, manacles, or tight spaces without a roll.

abilities.name: Quick Grip
abilities.description: Equip/unequip freely, as if all weapons had Quickdraw.

abilities.name: Twinkletoes
abilities.description: Once per combat, move through difficult terrain as normal.

abilities.name: Step Lightly
abilities.description: You leave no visible tracks and can bypass floor traps without triggering them.

abilities.name: Beast Whisperer
abilities.description: Advantage on calming or directing non-hostile beasts.

abilities.name: Echo of the Wilds
abilities.description: Ask the GM 1 question about natural dangers/resources per session.

abilities.name: Beast Empathy
abilities.description: You may calm or communicate basic emotions to wild animals without rolling, as long as they aren't hostile.

abilities.name: Seafarer's Intuition
abilities.description: You never get lost at sea and always which direction points to the nearest coast.

abilities.name: That's Just Like You
abilities.description: Once per day you may roll a check with advantage when invoking one of your traits.

abilities.name: Skilled Artisan
abilities.description: Choose one Practice skill with which you're proficient. You may roll all checks and contests with that skill with advantage.

abilities.name: Recuperation (1)
abilities.description: Increase your recovery die by 1 level (d4->d6, etc).

abilities.name: Recuperation (2)
abilities.description: Increase your recovery die by 1 level (d6->d8, etc).

abilities.name: Recuperation (3)
abilities.description: Increase your recovery die by 1 level (d8->d10, etc).

abilities.name: Sturdy Spirit
abilities.description: Roll recovery dice with advantage during a rest.

abilities.name: Enduring Rest
abilities.description: Remove 1 additional exhaustion on short rest.

abilities.name: Hardy Resolve
abilities.description: Recover from wounds in half the usual time.

abilities.name: Determination
abilities.description: Any time you roll a check or contest you may take on 1 exhaustion to reroll. You must use the rerolled value.

abilities.name: Iron Gut
abilities.description: Immune to spoiled food/drink; advantage vs. ingested poisons.

abilities.name: Unshakable
abilities.description: Cannot be Frightened or Confused unless below half HP.

abilities.name: Second Wind
abilities.description: Once per day if your HP falls to 0, you instead fall to 1 HP.

abilities.name: Social Operator
abilities.description: Gain 1 extra Merit when Carousing or Networking.

abilities.name: Silvertongue
abilities.description: Your first social skill check against a new NPC each session has advantage.

abilities.name: Endearing Quirk
abilities.description: Once per day you may reroll a failed Conversational skill check if you invoke a Trait.

abilities.name: Captivating Presence
abilities.description: Once per day after performing for a group, you may reroll one Conversational skill check against someone who saw it.

abilities.name: Underworld Contacts
abilities.description: You always know how to find fences, forgers, or criminals in towns and cities. Gain advantage on Conversational checks with them.

abilities.name: Adept Tracker
abilities.description: Auto-detect recent movement; advantage on detailed tracking.
